## Recent workshops and conference presentations

### Workshop 2

-   Title: [Geostatistical modelling](https://sctravelmedconference.com/speakers-2022/ "Spatial analysis workshop")
-   Date: September 17, 2022
-   Location: Hilton Hotel, Brisbane

I was an invited speaker at the 5th Annual South Cross Travel Medicine Conference and the Inaugural South Cross Tropical Medicine Conference, conducted from 16th - 18th September 2022 at Hilton Hotel Brisbane.

### Workshop 3

-   Title: [Spatial Analysis Using QGIS and R](https://malariaatlas.org/news/spatial-analysis-training-in-ethiopia-2/ "Spatial analysis in R")
-   Date: December 16 - 20, 2022
-   Location: Nazret, Ethiopia

I conducted a five-day workshop on Introduction to Spatial Analysis as part of a collaborative effort between the EPHI National Data Management Centre, MAP, and the Australian-Based Ethiopian Researchers Network (ABReN). The workshop took place from October 16th to December 20th, 2022.

I was invited to speak at the 2023 [ACREME annual meeting](https://www.acreme.edu.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/ACREME-Annual-Meeting-Program.pdf) held from May 23-24, 2023, at the Graduate House in Carlton, VIC.
